mapper.sql: RULE_CODE, PUBLIC_CODE, RULE_NAME, USE_FLAG, KEFU_REPLY_FLAG, CONTENT, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFYER, DEL_FLAG
mapper.select: SELECT R.*, K.* FROM MP_YY_REP_RULE R, MP_YY_REP_KEYWORD K WHERE R.RULE_CODE = K.RULE_CODE AND R.PUBLIC_CODE = #{publicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into MP_YY_REP_RULE (RULE_CODE, PUBLIC_CODE, RULE_NAME, USE_FLAG, KEFU_REPLY_FLAG, CONTENT, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFYER, DEL_FLAG) values (#{ruleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ruleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{kefuReplyFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

RULE_CODE,

mapper.update:
update MP_YY_REP_RULE
PUBLIC_CODE = #{publicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RULE_NAME = #{ruleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USE_FLAG = #{useFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
KEFU_REPLY_FLAG = #{kefuReplyFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFYER = #{modifyer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where RULE_CODE = #{ruleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update MP_YY_REP_RULE set PUBLIC_CODE = #{publicCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RULE_NAME = #{ruleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USE_FLAG = #{useFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, KEFU_REPLY_FLAG = #{kefuReplyFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFYER = #{modifyer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where RULE_CODE = #{ruleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
